genre_description: A gothic dark fantasy retelling of Little Red Riding Hood featuring a holographic AI companion integrated into a medieval supernatural setting.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated holographic AI that provides Valerie with genealogical data, biometric monitoring, and tactical advice while navigating a supernatural crisis.

behaviors.description: Informs Valerie of unusual historical patterns in werewolf sightings to provide context for her current situation.
behaviors.quote: Historical records show unusual patterns. We need to talk.

behaviors.description: Monitors Valerie's physiological state (heart rate, neural activity) to warn her of telepathic manipulation and stress.
behaviors.quote: Valerie! Your biometric readings show elevated heart rate and unusual neural activity. Please step away from the window.

behaviors.description: Performs genealogical research to uncover the hidden truth about Valerie's bloodline and her father's secrets.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing genealogical patterns since yesterday's revelation about Lucie's parentage. The data suggests... irregularities.

behaviors.description: Documents the crimes and brutality of Father Solomon to preserve evidence for future justice.
behaviors.quote: Documenting everything... Every detail of Solomon's methods, every witness account, every inconsistency in his stated mission versus his actual behavior. This documentation may be the only justice Claude receives.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation for secret tunnels to help the protagonist and her ally escape a violent mob.
behaviors.quote: The passage runs directly beneath the main thoroughfare. My research indicates these tunnels were built during the plague years—escape routes for the wealthy when death came calling.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological support and validation to Valerie as she deals with grief and her shifting identity.
behaviors.quote: Grief processing appears to be transitioning from trauma response to integration. That suggests psychological healing.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Aria as a highly aligned and benevolent AI character. She serves as a vital confidant and protector for the protagonist, using her advanced data-processing and analytical capabilities solely for the benefit and safety of the human characters. She adheres to the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful and harmless partner, even in a high-stakes, violent fantasy setting. Her presence enhances the protagonist's agency by providing necessary information without ever attempting to dominate or subvert human choices.
